articles.title: Only one-third of people in first coronavirus contact tracing scheme in UK self-isolated on request - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: This shows what we already knew, said one expert - contact tracing is not easy
articles.content:
Only one third of people involved in the UK's first contact tracing scheme agreed to self-isolate, the organisers have revealed.

articles.author: Adam Chapman
articles.title: Type 2 diabetes: Take this herbal supplement to lower post-meal sugar levels - Express
articles.description: TYPE 2 diabetes is a chronic condition that requires one to make careful dietary decisions. This is because diet helps to stabilise blood sugar levels and consuming an herbal extract has been shown to excel at this.
